contactBlocking.title: Contact Blocking
contactBlocking.whyWeNeedAccessExplanation:
Accord needs to read your contacts to help you avoid awkward situations.

âœ… What we do:
â€¢ Read phone numbers from your contacts
â€¢ Convert them to encrypted codes on YOUR device
â€¢ Hide matching profiles from your discovery feed

âŒ What we DON'T do:
â€¢ Upload your contacts to our servers
â€¢ Store names, emails, or any personal info
â€¢ Share your contacts with anyone

ðŸ” Your contacts are processed locally and never leave your device in readable form. Only encrypted codes are stored for matching.
contactBlocking.permissionDeniedMessage: You can enable contacts access later in your device settings if you change your mind.
contactBlocking.permissionRequiredMessage: Please allow access to your contacts to use this feature.
contactBlocking.noContactsFoundMessage:
No contacts were found on your device. This could happen if:

â€¢ Your contacts are stored in a cloud account that's not synced
â€¢ Contacts permission was partially granted

Try syncing your contacts and try again.
contactBlocking.noPhoneNumbersMessage: Your contacts don't have any phone numbers saved. Contact blocking only works with contacts that have phone numbers.
contactBlocking.protectedMessage:
{{count}} contact(s) are now blocked from your discovery feed.

ðŸ” All phone numbers were encrypted on your device using SHA-256. Your contacts' privacy is fully protected.

These profiles will never appear in your feed, and they'll never know.
contactBlocking.clearContactBlocksMessage: Are you sure you want to remove all contact blocks? Profiles from your contacts will appear in discovery again.
contactBlocking.clearedMessage: All contact blocks have been removed.
contactBlocking.clearError: Failed to clear blocks. Please try again.
contactBlocking.stayPrivateSafeMessage: Avoid awkward encounters by preventing people in your contacts from appearing in your discovery feed.
contactBlocking.privacyProtectedDetails:
â€¢ Phone numbers are encrypted on YOUR device
â€¢ We never see your contacts' names or info
â€¢ Nothing is uploaded to our servers
â€¢ You can remove blocks anytime
contactBlocking.step1Text: You'll see a clear explanation of how we protect your privacy, then grant access to your contacts. We only read phone numbersâ€”no names, emails, or other info.
contactBlocking.step2Text: Phone numbers are immediately converted to encrypted codes using SHA-256 (military-grade encryption) on YOUR device. We never see the actual numbers.
contactBlocking.step3Text: Profiles with matching phone numbers are automatically hidden from your discovery feed. They'll never know, and you'll never see each other.
contactBlocking.privacyGuaranteedText: Your contacts never leave your device in readable form. We use the same encryption technology that banks use to protect your data. Phone numbers are converted to encrypted codes instantly on your device, and only these codes are stored. We can't read your contacts, and neither can anyone else.
contactBlocking.commonQuestionsText:
â€¢ "Can Accord see my contacts?" No. We only see encrypted codes.
â€¢ "Will my contacts know?" No. This is completely invisible to them.
â€¢ "Can I undo this?" Yes. Tap "Clear All Blocks" anytime.
â€¢ "What if I add new contacts?" Tap "Update Blocked Contacts" to refresh.

countryBlocking.title: Country Blocking
countryBlocking.countryBlockedMessage: Users from {{country}} will no longer see your profile or appear in your discovery feed.
countryBlocking.blockError: Failed to block country. Please try again.
countryBlocking.removeBlockMessage: Are you sure you want to unblock {{country}}? Users from this country will be able to see your profile again.
countryBlocking.removeError: Failed to remove block. Please try again.
countryBlocking.staySafeGloballyMessage: Protect yourself by hiding your profile from users in specific countries. This is especially useful if you live in or travel to regions where LGBTQ+ safety is a concern.
countryBlocking.noCountriesBlocked:
No countries blocked yet.
Your profile is visible worldwide.
countryBlocking.howItWorksText:
When you block a country:
â€¢ Users from that country won't see your profile
â€¢ They won't appear in your discovery feed
â€¢ Existing matches are NOT affected
countryBlocking.privacyNote: Your blocked countries list is private and never shared with other users.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.warningText: Once you delete your account, all your data will be permanently removed from our servers. This action cannot be undone.

deleteAccount.confirmUnderstand: To confirm you understand this action is permanent, type DELETE below:
deleteAccount.footerNote: This action is permanent. Your account and all data will be deleted within 30 days and cannot be recovered.

subscriptionSettings.developmentModeDescription: RevenueCat is disabled in development. Your subscription status is controlled by the is_premium and is_platinum flags in the database.
subscriptionSettings.developmentModeProductionNote: In production, this screen will show real subscription packages and allow users to manage their subscriptions through the App Store or Play Store.

In production, this will open your App Store or Play Store subscription settings.

alerts.codeRedemptionFailed: Failed to open code redemption. Please try again.
alerts.subscriptionExistsAndroid:
You have a canceled subscription on your current Google Play account.

Options:

1. Reactivate your existing subscription in Google Play Settings

2. Use a different Google Play account: Sign out of Google Play on your device, then sign in with a different account and try again
alerts.subscriptionExistsIOS:
You have a canceled subscription on your current Apple ID.

Options:

1. Reactivate your existing subscription in App Store Settings

2. Use a different Apple ID: Sign out in Settings > [Your Name], then sign in with a different Apple ID and try again
alerts.purchaseFailedMessage: Failed to complete purchase. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
